titlepage.titleproper: Guide to the American Women's Himalayan Expedition, Inc. : files, 1974-1984
titlepage.publisher:
Department of Special Collections and University Archives
Stanford University Libraries
Stanford, California

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Beardsley, Irene A., collector. American Women's Himalayan Expedition, Inc. : files,

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: Stanford University. Libraries. Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives.

did.abstract: Irene Beardsley was a member of the successful expedition of 1978 to Annapurna; she maintained this collection of files. The collection includes research, correspondence, logistics, equipment, legal and financial files for the expedition. Also included is a signed copy of Arlene Blum's ANNAPURNA; A WOMAN'S PLACE, 1980.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation:
prefercite.p: American Women's Himalayan Expedition, Inc. : files. M1220. Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: Irene Beardsley was a member of the successful expedition of 1978 to Annapurna; she maintained this collection of files.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Includes research, correspondence, logistics, equipment, legal and financial files for the expedition. Also included is a signed copy of Arlene Blum's ANNAPURNA; A WOMAN'S PLACE, 1980.

controlaccess.head: Access Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
controlaccess.subject: Mountaineering--Nepal--Annapurna.
Mountaineering expeditions.
Women mountaineers--United States.
controlaccess.title: Annapurna; a woman's place.

did.unittitle: Correspondence with American Alpine Club and Nepal1973 Apr. 9 - 1977 Apr. 12

scopecontent.p: Contains correspondence regarding application for permission to climb Annapurna in fall of 1978 by the AWHE. Also an earlier application for an international women's group to climb in the spring of 1975
Contains information regarding American Alpine Club's first expedition to Nepal including
Contains the mountaineering rules of Nepal and a copy of the application for permission to climb Annapurna in fall of 1978 by the AWHE.
Contains correspondence with members of Dutch expedition that climbed Annapurna in 1977 by the Dutch Rib, and copies of related articles.
Contains correspondence with members of other expeditions to Annapurna and other Nepalese peaks.

did.unittitle: Minutes of AWHE Meetings1976 Jan. 21 - 1978 Apr. 9

scopecontent.p: Minutes of meetings of AWHE expedition members and supporters working on planning and fund raising.

did.unittitle: Fund Raising - Fact Sheets, Press Releases1977 - 1978

scopecontent.p: Drafts of publicity for fund raising, copy of NY TImes article.
Flier for Sacramento event, various documents and tee shirt order forms.
Cost estimates, advertising, correspondence related to the two treks organized for fund raising.

did.unittitle: Legal - Incorporation of AWHE1977 Aug. 22 - 1982 Mar. 1

scopecontent.p: Legal documents of incorporation and unincorporation of AWHE, with related correspondence.
Correspondence related to corporate fundraising.
Many letters accompaning personal donations to AWHE before the expedition left in August 1978.
Many letters accompaning personal tax-deductible donations to AWHE through the American Alpine Club, thanks to AAC sponsorship. Also periodic reports from the AAC of donations received.

did.unittitle: Donations - Copies of Checks Deposited by AWHE1978 Mar. 23 - 1978 July 17

scopecontent.p: Copies of checks from individuals sent to AWHE during 1978.
Computer listing of all individuals donating money to AWHE up to July 10, 1978.
Notes on logistics of Dutch 1977 expedition. Estimated logistics for AWHE. Account balance, Mar. 1, 1978.
Food planning and evaluation afterwards.
Correspondence concerning medical planning, purchase of oxygen bottles and masks from earlier expeditions.
Correspondence concerning possible high altitude research to be carried out by AWHE, including physiological studies by Barbara Drinkwater at UC Santa Barbara.
Equipment lists from several other expeditions, including Everest the Hard Way, American Jannu Expedition 1978, and lists for Sirdar and High Altitude Porters from Himalayan Society.
Correspondence regarding equipment; final equipment lists; info on radios, tents; list of corporations donating equipment; shipping info.
Specification from each member of needed equipment and sizes.

Lists of all goods taken to Nepal, to be consumed in Nepal and to be re-exported. Breakdown by package. Contents of boxes as repacked in 65 lb loads to be carried by porters. Boxes for the higher camps. List of corporations making equipment donations, and printout of addresses.
Correspondence with corporations regarding equipment used.
Budget estimates for the climb, and proposed budget for 1980 - 1981.
Contains invoices for equipment, food, other miscellaneous services, and for reimbursement of expenses by expedition members, all before the expedition left the USA.

did.unittitle: Correspondence - M. J. Cheney, Sherpa Cooperative1977 Jan. 12 - 1979 Apr. 28

scopecontent.p: Correspondence between AWHE and M. J. Cheney, the head of Sherpa Coop in Nepal, who became our representative with the Nepal government and our source of Sherpas.
Sherpa Coop bills for the base camp reconnoitre, pay for Sherpas, pay for porters, and other miscellaneous receipts.
Setting up of bank account in Nepal. Summary of expenses while in Nepal.
Miscellaneous invoices for services after the expedition returned.
Miscellaneous invoices for services after the expedition returned.
Invoices from AWHE members for expenses both before and after the expedition.
Articles of incorporation and corporate income tax returns and related correspondence.
Articles of incorporation and corporate income tax returns and related correspondence.
Articles of incorporation and corporate income tax returns and related correspondence.
Corporate income tax returns and related correspondence.
Correspondence related to dissolution of AWHE as a corporation.
Checking account registers.
Checking account statements.
Registers and statements from cashfund account with Paine Webber.
Correspondence concerning support from and article in National Geographic.

did.unittitle: Other Articles by Members1978 Dec. 15 - 1979 Nov. 29

scopecontent.p: Three drafts of article written by Vera Komarkova for American Alpine Journal. Draft of article by Piro Kramar for "The Physician and Sports Medicine". Copy of article by Joan Firey in The Mountaineer. Exerpts from diaries of Vera Komarkova and Irene Miller.
Correspondence concerning income from use of photos.
Correspondence concerning slide shows.
Correspondence concerning slide shows.
Correspondence concerning possible filmmakers.
Film agreement, progress report, footage guide.

Agreement between AWHE, Ashton, Taylor, and ABC Sports. Correspondence related to production and showing of film, and ownership and storage of film materials. Amendment to film agreement. Letter about movie script based on book.

controlaccess.corpname: Franklin, Weinrib, Rudell and Vassallo, P>C>
controlaccess.subject: Annapurna - A Woman's Place

scopecontent.p: Contract with Serious Business Company for marketing film. Related correspondence. Information on several film festivals.
Invoices for storage of film original materials by Bonded Services.
Correspondence about accounting of film-related expenses. Dyanna Taylor's expenses. Letter about distribution agreement with Women Make Movies.
Letters from Guy Smiley to Irene Beardsley concerning a paper on the expedition for a course in women's history at SUNY-Binghampton, New York. Draft of summary of paper.
Index of files of Irene Beardsley and Vera Watson, prepared by Guy Smiley, history student at SUNY-Binghamton NY. These file categories are no longer valid.
Correspondence concerning "Encounters in Excellence" speakers program for middle school students.
Correspondence concerning interviews and public appearances for Irene Miller.
Two sets of mailing labels of supporters of the expedition dated roughly January 1979.
Various lists of names and addresses of AWHE supporters.

did.unittitle: Office Memos - Colin Miller1978 Dec. 12 - 1979 Apr. 5

scopecontent.p: Handwritten memos of business conducted by Colin Miller immediately after the expedition.
Miscellaneous correspondence to Vera Watson. Photo of Vera at pre-expedition party.
Correspondence related to publication of a Women's Climbing Directory by AWHE and Woodswomaen
Corespondence related to summer meets of AWHE supporters in 1979, 1980, 1981, 1982. Letter from Janusz Onyszkiewics (husband of Alison Chadwick) and information on British fund commemorating Alison.

did.unittitle: Donations to AWHE and VWACO 1978 Oct. 31 - 1980 May 27

scopecontent.p: Early donations through AWHE to the Vera Watson Alison Chadwick-Onyszkiewicz Memorial Fund, set up to support women climbers and later run through the American Alpine Club.

did.unittitle: Grants Funded by AWHE1978 Dec. 28 - 1986 May 9

scopecontent.p: Applications directly to AWHE for grants for women's expeditions from spring of 1982 to 1986.
Applications and grants funded by VWACO for spring of 1980. Reports of expecitions.
Applications and grants funded by VWACO for spring of 1981. Expedition reports.
Applications and grants funded by VWACO for fall of 1981. Expedition reports.
Applications and grants funded by VWACO for spring of 1982. Expedition reports.

did.unittitle: VWACO Fund - Fall 1982 - French-American Women's Climbing Exchange1982 June 19 - 1984 May 21

scopecontent.p: Applications and grants funded by VWACO for the French-American Women's Climbing Exchange, in which six American climbers travelled to Paris and climbed with French hosts.
Applications and grants funded by VWACO for spring of 1983. Expedition reports.
Applications and grants funded by VWACO for fall of 1983. Expedition reports.
Applications and grants funded by VWACO for spring of 1984. Expedition reports.
Applications and grants funded by VWACO for fall of 1984. Expedition reports.
Applications and grants funded by VWACO for 1985. Expedition reports.
Applications and grants funded by VWACO for 1986. Expedition reports.
Applications and grants funded by VWACO for 1987. Expedition reports.
Applications and grants funded by VWACO for 1988. Expedition reports.
American Alpine Club statements listing contributions to the VWACO Fund from March 1979 to September 1984.

did.unittitle: VWACO Fund - Committee Meetings and Correspondence1979 Mar. 28 - 1994 Mar. 14

scopecontent.p: Agreement between AWHE and the American Alpine Club to establish the Vera Watson/Alison Chadwick-Onyskiewicz fund for promoting women's mountaineering. Committee minutes, press releases, correspondence. Applications from 1988 on.

did.unittitle: "Annapurna A Woman's Place," by Arlene Blum1980

scopecontent.p: Signed copy of Annapurna A Woman's Place by Arlene Blum, the story of the 1978 climb of Annapurna by the American Women's Himalayan Expedition.
Summit Magazine April-May 1978 Volume 24, Number 2, with article "American Women to Attempt Annapurna I, by Vera Watson and Irene Miller.
